name: Gemini
author: SwiftBiu
description: Send the selected text to Google Gemini and get the response.

configuration.label: Gemini API Key
configuration.description: Obtain an API key from Google AI Studio.

configuration.label: Reset Timer (minutes)
configuration.description: Reset the conversation if idle for this many minutes. Set blank to disable.
